TemplateSQL.FixedSQL: SET NOCOUNT ON /**************************************************/ /* 매출팁정보 - T_SALE_TIP 조회 - SELECT QUERY */ /**************************************************/ SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SELECT SALE_CODE , A.SEQ , A.EMPLOYEE_MEMBER_CODE , A.EMPLOYEE_NAME , A.CUSTOMER_MEMBER_CODE , A.CUSTOMER_MEMBER_NAME , A.COST , A.TOT_TIP_TAX , A.TIP_TAX1 , A.TIP_TAX2 , A.TIP_TAX3 , A.PRICE , A.REMARK , A.INSERT_CODE , A.INSERT_DATE , A.UPDATE_CODE , A.UPDATE_DATE FROM T_SALE_TIP A WHERE 1=1 #[SALE_CODE] #[SEQ] SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /************************************************/ /* 매출팁정보 - T_SALE_TIP 저장 - SAVE QUERY */ /************************************************/ DECLARE @SALE_CODE BIGINT = N'{0}' , @SEQ INT = N'{1}' , @EMPLOYEE_MEMBER_CODE BIGINT = CONVERT(BIGINT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{2}') = 1 THEN '{2}' ELSE '0' END ) , @EMPLOYEE_NAME NVARCHAR(200) = N'{3}' , @CUSTOMER_MEMBER_CODE INT = CONVERT(INT, CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{4}') = 1 THEN '{4}' ELSE '0' END ) , @CUSTOMER_MEMBER_NAME NVARCHAR(200) = N'{5}' , @COST NUMERIC(30,6) = CONVERT(NUMERIC(30,6), CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{6}') = 1 THEN '{6}' ELSE '0' END ) , @TOT_TIP_TAX NUMERIC(30,6) = CONVERT(NUMERIC(30,6), CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{7}') = 1 THEN '{7}' ELSE '0' END ) , @TIP_TAX1 NUMERIC(30,6) = CONVERT(NUMERIC(30,6), CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{8}') = 1 THEN '{8}' ELSE '0' END ) , @TIP_TAX2 NUMERIC(30,6) = CONVERT(NUMERIC(30,6), CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{9}') = 1 THEN '{9}' ELSE '0' END ) , @TIP_TAX3 NUMERIC(30,6) = CONVERT(NUMERIC(30,6), CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{10}') = 1 THEN '{10}' ELSE '0' END ) , @PRICE NUMERIC(30,6) = CONVERT(NUMERIC(30,6), CASE WHEN ISNUMERIC('{11}') = 1 THEN '{11}' ELSE '0' END ) , @REMARK NVARCHAR(200) = N'{12}' , @INSERT_CODE INT = {13} , @INSERT_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE() , @UPDATE_CODE INT = {13} , @UPDATE_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
UPDATE A SET EMPLOYEE_MEMBER_CODE = @EMPLOYEE_MEMBER_CODE , EMPLOYEE_NAME = @EMPLOYEE_NAME , CUSTOMER_MEMBER_CODE = @CUSTOMER_MEMBER_CODE , CUSTOMER_MEMBER_NAME = @CUSTOMER_MEMBER_NAME , COST = @COST , TOT_TIP_TAX = @TOT_TIP_TAX , TIP_TAX1 = @TIP_TAX1 , TIP_TAX2 = @TIP_TAX2 , TIP_TAX3 = @TIP_TAX3 , PRICE = @PRICE , REMARK = @REMARK , UPDATE_CODE = @UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE = @UPDATE_DATE FROM T_SALE_TIP A WHERE SALE_CODE= @SALE_CODE AND SEQ= @SEQ IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO T_SALE_TIP ( SALE_CODE , SEQ , EMPLOYEE_MEMBER_CODE , EMPLOYEE_NAME , CUSTOMER_MEMBER_CODE , CUSTOMER_MEMBER_NAME , COST , TOT_TIP_TAX , TIP_TAX1 , TIP_TAX2 , TIP_TAX3 , PRICE , REMARK , INSERT_CODE , INSERT_DATE , UPDATE_CODE , UPDATE_DATE ) SELECT @SALE_CODE , @SEQ , @EMPLOYEE_MEMBER_COD , @EMPLOYEE_NAME , @CUSTOMER_MEMBER_COD , @CUSTOMER_MEMBER_NAM , @COST , @TOT_TIP_TAX , @TIP_TAX1 , @TIP_TAX2 , @TIP_TAX3 , @PRICE , @REMARK , @INSERT_CODE , @INSERT_DATE , @UPDATE_CODE , @UPDATE_DATE END SET NOCOUNT OFF
